title: Having problems logging in?
body: I been trying to log in for the pass 30min. I changed my password 2 times and still says i cant log in. Can someone help me with this?

replies.body: You might just be having some odd connection issues out of nowhere. Try double-checking some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that helps.
